did.abstract: Legal document from a Wythe County, Virginia man listing his land and slave holdings.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Robert Crockett Papers, Ms1988-076, Special Collections, University Libraries, Virginia Polytechnic Institute & State University.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Robert Crockett Papers were purchased by Special Collections in 1988.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: Robert Crockett was a Wythe County, Virginia land and slave owner.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: An appraisal of Robert Crockett's assets as of 1815. The appraisal gives an estimation of the cost of his plantation in Wythe County, Virginia; as well as the cost and ages of his slaves.
